definition[0]: a suggestion that someone or something is the cause of a particular situation, or is responsible for a particular action, especially something bad
example[0]: A corporation may sue for an imputation on its trading reputation.
example[1]: The company wished to avoid the imputation of blame for the accident.
definition[1]: a method of calculating the value of something when you do not know what the actual value is
example[2]: The Population Census used a procedure of imputation to infer values for those households which failed to return their forms.
